name: KCBI'sAllTeachingChannel
0:
”Alexa, launch k. c. b. i.'s all teaching channel.”
”Alexa, open k. c. b. i.'s all teaching channel.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. c. b. i.'s all teaching channel
des:
Find bold, biblical teaching 24/7 to help you grow in your faith, from the nation's top pastors on KCBI's All Teaching Channel.
Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open k. c. b. i.'s all teaching channel" and Alexa will guide you from there!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
